00011 // substrate.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Substrate Class Declarations
00015 class Substrate : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // Substrate Public Methods
00018         Substrate(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kd, Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > ks,
00019                         Reference<Texture<float> > u, Reference<Texture<float> > v,
00020                         Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00021                 Kd = kd;
00022                 Ks = ks;
00023                 nu = u;
00024                 nv = v;
00025                 bumpMap = bump;
00026         }
00027         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00028 private:
00029         // Substrate Private Data
00030         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd, Ks;
00031         Reference<Texture<float> > nu, nv;
00032         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00033 };
00034 // Substrate Method Definitions
00035 BSDF *Substrate::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00036         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00037         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00038         if (bumpMap)
00039                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00040         else
00041                 dgs = dgShading;
00042         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00043         Spectrum d = Kd->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00044         Spectrum s = Ks->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00045         float u = nu->Evaluate(dgs);
00046         float v = nv->Evaluate(dgs);
00047 
00048         bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelBlend)(d, s, BSDF_ALLOC(Anisotropic)(1.f/u, 1.f/v)));
00049         return bsdf;
00050 }
00051 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00052                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00053         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kd", Spectrum(.5f));
00054         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Ks = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Ks", Spectrum(.5f));
00055         Reference<Texture<float> > uroughness = mp.GetFloatTexture("uroughness", .1f);
00056         Reference<Texture<float> > vroughness = mp.GetFloatTexture("vroughness", .1f);
00057         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00058         return new Substrate(Kd, Ks, uroughness, vroughness, bumpMap);
00059 }
